Pretty much everything!

We went back and supercharged the developers with energy drinks and MTO appetizers to create an improved experience from the ground up.

Coolest feature: Mobile Ordering!
Slickest feature: Payment and MySheetz Card interactions!
Sheetziest feature: New Rewardz and Offers!
Trickiest feature: Showing stores along your route

Pretty much everything!

We went back and supercharged the developers with energy drinks and MTO appetizers to create an improved experience from the ground up.

Coolest feature: Mobile Ordering!
Slickest feature: Payment and MySheetz Card interactions!
Sheetziest feature: New Rewardz and Offers!
Trickiest feature: Showing stores along your route

First round of optimizations and bug fixes.

This corrects the issue with choosing a store for mobile ordering that some customers experienced.

Please keep sending us your feedback!

Just in time for the Holidays, send Sheetz gift cards from the app!

Recipients can either print the cards or automatically add them to their Sheetz app.

We’ve also done some optimization and fixed a few bugs.

Exciting Feature: Unlock Kiosk
You’ve been asking for it, and now it’s here. Our in-store kiosks can now save and recall your favorite items/orders!
Here’s how it works:
- Visit one of our in-store Ordering Kiosks
- Scan the on-screen QR code using the app to log-in to the kiosk
- You can recall, rename and re-order your favorites!
- You can also save new favorites and view your order history!

We’ve also optimized the app and fixed a few bugs.
